flawed_nl_solution:
Every donut costs him $0.19999999999999998 because 2.4 divided by 12 equals <<2.4/12=0.19999999999999998>>0.19999999999999998
So he makes $8 for every donut he sells because $1 minus $0.19999999999999998 equals 8
He needs to sell 12 donuts because 96 divided by 8 equals <<96/8=12>>12.
He needs to buy and sell 1 dozen donuts because 12 divided by 12 equals <<12/12=1>>1

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 0.8, not 8.0. It appears the decimal point was misplaced.
